meanings.definition: Glutaminases: enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of glutamine to glutamate and ammonia.
meanings.sent1: The glutaminases in our bodies help break down glutamine into useful components.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study glutaminases to understand how they convert glutamine into glutamate and ammonia.
meanings.sent3: The glutaminases at work are like tiny chemical chefs cooking up glutamine dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the action of glutaminases breaking down glutamine.
meanings.sent5: The glutaminases worked tirelessly, transforming glutamine into essential building blocks.
